custom-action.name: sendsnowcontext
custom-action.description:
Send the Project Context to NeoLoad WEB ( required to Synchronize the test execution with ServiceNow).
Possible parameters are: - ArtifactName1 (required): Name of the Artifact 1 Default value is "Name of the Artifact 1". - ArtifactVersion1 (required): Version of the Artifact 1 Default value is "Version of the Artifact 1". - PackagesName (required): Name of the packages seperated by , Default value is "Name of the packages seperated by ,". - StageName (required): Name of the Stage Default value is "Name of the Stage". - PipelineName (optional): Name of the Pipeline Default value is "Name of the Pipeline". - BuildNumber (optional): Build Number Default value is "Build Number".
